info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 7:20AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern McDowell, northern Rutherford, western Caldwell and western Burke Counties through 745 AM EDT... At 720 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Blowing Rock to 11 miles northwest of Rutherfordton. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morganton, Lenoir, Gamewell, Blowing Rock In Caldwell County, Glen Alpine, Lake James State Park, Table Rock, Lake James, South Mountains State Park and Nebo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
